code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GetSubmission=()=>{const[submissions,setSubmissions]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState('');const fetchSubmissions=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('https://gessamubackend.onrender.com/task/getSubmittedTask');setSubmissions(response.data);}catch(error){setError('No submitted tasks found.');console.error(error);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchSubmissions();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-100 py-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-4xl mx-auto bg-white p-8 rounded-lg shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-blue-600 mb-8 text-center",children:"Submissions"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-600 text-center mb-6",children:error}),submissions.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-4",children:submissions.map(submittedTask=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-50 p-4 rounded-md shadow-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800",children:submittedTask.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:["Submitted by: ",submittedTask._id||'Anonymous']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:["Submitted on: ",new Date(submittedTask.date).toLocaleString()]})]},submittedTask._id))}):!error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 text-center",children:"No submissions found."})]})});};export default GetSubmission;
